txt.en: Within the ruins of Stormwall, the vacant lair of Etterfang remains vastly unexplored….\n\nYour mission is to survey the ruins of Stormwall.
You have been tasked with surveying the ruins of Stormwall.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from Stormwall. The old ruins have not yet been properly surveyed as the group was running short on time and supplies. We must return to properly survey the structure of the old ruins.

'Stormwall is in disrepair, but it could be a great keep and forge again one day!'
Monsters in this mission will apply a corruption buff to nearby allies.
Your mission is to survey the ruins of Stormwall.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Stormwall.

'Well done! With your survey efforts, we should be able to assess Stormwall for repairs. This may need to wait until after Gundabad has been claimed, as Stormwall will need many hands to bring splendour back to its halls.'
